name: UniversalSwitch(UNIS)
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The UNIS app is an intelligent home automation application that empowers users to seamlessly integrate their UNIS buttons and motion sensors with their Alexa Routines. With this innovative platform, users can effortlessly activate specific Alexa Routines with a simple button click.

With simple step:
1. Add hub in UNIS app
2. Pair button or motion sensor
3. Select any button or motion sensor
4. Add Alexa as selected function
5. Open Alexa app and adjust the device with your any Routines
